docs: add manual verification guide for callWorkerMethod helper

Testing Approach

Changes:
- Added scripts/test-helper-refactoring.ts
- Manual verification guide (browser console + UI testing)
- Expected results documentation

Why Manual Testing:
- Pyodide requires browser environment (Web Workers, WASM)
- Jest runs in Node.js (no browser APIs)
- UI testing is more practical for Pyodide integration

Verification Methods:
1. Browser console test with sample data
2. UI-based testing through statistics page

Success Criteria:
- Mean: 5.5, Median: 5.5, Min: 1, Max: 10
- All properties (std, q1, q3, skewness, kurtosis) present
- No errors during execution
